title: How to change music and sounds in the league alpha client?
body: In the old client you were able to do this. It still actually works now changing the same files, but only on the old client. Is there any way to change queue, ban, and champ select music in the new client?

replies.body:
Altering the game files to be able to play different music on the champion select screen is not something I suggest as it could cause corruption in other game files. 

This pretty much goes for any changes to game files, since you can't be 100% sure that those changes won't affect other files.
I really miss having the Mortal Kombat theme playing in champ select tho...feelsbadman
Oh man, that must have been pretty epic I'm not gonna lie xD!!!

I did this all the time on the old client and never got corruption issues as long you name the files properly there is no issue, this should be implemented in the new client the customisation to do it was really cool. FeelsBadMan
